short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lists Reddit threads availible for the current directory.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Analyzes the current URL to check if it has been submitted on Reddit! Useful for finding discussions on news, YouTube videos, blogs, and more. Great for discovering hobby-based or very esoteric subreddits!
